page.title: 10PLAYGROUND AND STREET GAMES
page.content: Chainey is a very popular game played by having one person on, who has to count up to a certain number.After that you have to try and catch some- body.When you succeed you hold their hands and try to catch the others.When everyone is caught the first person who was caught is on next game.Another game is polo.A person has to be on and they choose a subject.The other people have to get together and say something on that subject.Then they shout out the words.The person picks one,runs to the wall and back again and shouts polo.Kerby is played with a football and two people.You have to throw the ball at the kerb and if it rebounces off the kerb you get ten points and if you catch the ball you get twenty points.At the end the one with the most points wins.
